snippet.title: Dead Star - First Reveal Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/dead-star-ps4/

Teaser trailer for the upcoming multiplayer space combat game Dead Star.

http://www.deadstargame.com

Dead Star is a multiplayer space combat shooter from Armature Studio. Banished to the edge of the known universe for your crimes, you must fight to survive in the prison space called the Wastes. Pilot a variety of unique ships through procedurally generated battlefields as you fight against other players, capturing and upgrading outposts to gain control of the region. Your skills in combat will determine whether you die in a blast of laser fire or gain infamy as the galaxy's greatest pilot.
